    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vztrajnostni moment, vrtilna energija, vrtilna količina</string>
            <string language="en">Moment of Inertia, Rotational Energy, and Angular Momentum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moment der Schwungkraft, der Rotationsenergie und
des eckigen Momentums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moment de l'inertie, de l'énergie de rotation, 
et de l'élan angulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Momento da inércia, da energia rotatória, e do 
momentum angular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Momento di inerzia, di energia di rotazione e di 
quantità di moto angolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στιγμή της αδράνειας, της περιστροφικής ενέργειας, και
της γωνιακής ορμής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Momento de la inercia, de la energía rotatoria, 
y del ímpetu angular</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija vrtilne kinetične energije, vrtilne količine in vztrajnostnega momenta.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of angular kinetic energy, angular momentum and moment of inertia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtilna kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">angular kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtilna količina</string>
            <string language="en">angular momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vztrajnostni moment</string>
            <string language="en">moment of inertia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der eckigen kinetischen Energie, 
des eckigen Momentums und des Momentes der Schwungkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration d'énergie cinétique angulaire, 
d'élan angulaire et de moment de l'inertie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração da energia cinética angular, do 
momentum angular e do momento da inércia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di energia cinetica angolare, di 
quantità di moto angolare e del momento di inerzia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της γωνιακής κινητικής ενέργειας, της 
γωνιακής ορμής και της στιγμής της αδράνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración de la energía cinética angular, 
del ímpetu angular y del momento de la inercia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eckige kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eckiges Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moment der Schwungkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique angulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan angulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moment de l'inertie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum angular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momento da inércia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica angolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto angolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">momento di inerzia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνιακή κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνιακή ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στιγμή της αδράνειας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética angular</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">momento de la inercia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación</string>
          </keyword>
